notes: This is a 48-bit unicast MAC address. It starts with the IANA OUI ("00-00-0E"). There are two instances that should be corrected if this document is revised or replaced. But I don't think this fix is worth re-issuing the document. If someone one looks this up in the IANA assignment table, it says there that the unicast numbers all actually start with 00-00-0E.
